solution_line_template: The writer is going to write {project_one_questions} questions + {project_two_questions} questions = <<{project_one_questions}+{project_two_questions}={total_questions}>>{total_questions} questions in 7 days.
He should aim to do {total_questions} questions / {days_in_week} days = <<{total_questions}/{days_in_week}={questions_per_day}>>{questions_per_day} questions/day.
